patthana3.14:1.1.pli: Saraṇaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.14:2.1.pli: Araṇaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:3.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… kamme dve, vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavāropi …pe… pañhāvāropi sabbattha vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.14:4.1.pli: Saraṇaṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.14:5.1.pli: Saraṇaṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:6.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:8.1.pli: Saraṇaṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.14:9.1.pli: Araṇaṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:10.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:13.1.pli: Araṇaṃ vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:16.1.pli: Araṇaṃ vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:23.1.pli: Araṇaṃ anupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.14:52.1.pli: Saraṇaṃ dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:54.1.pli: Saraṇaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:56.1.pli: Araṇaṃ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.14:58.1.pli: Saraṇaṃ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:63.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye tīṇi …pe… kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.14:64.1.pli: Saraṇaṃ ācayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo ācayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.14:116.1.pli: Araṇaṃ maggādhipatiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:117.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana3.14:118.1.pli: Saraṇo uppanno dhammo saraṇassa uppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Saraṇo uppanno dhammo araṇassa uppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Saraṇo uppanno dhammo saraṇassa uppannassa ca araṇassa uppannassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.14:119.1.pli: Araṇo uppanno dhammo araṇassa uppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.14:120.1.pli: Araṇo uppanno dhammo araṇassa uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:121.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre indriye jhāne magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.14:122.1.pli: Saraṇo paccuppanno dhammo saraṇassa paccuppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana3.14:123.1.pli: Araṇo paccuppanno dhammo araṇassa paccuppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:124.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.14:125.1.pli: Saraṇaṃ atītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.14:126.1.pli: Araṇaṃ atītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:127.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbo.)

patthana3.14:128.1.pli: Saraṇaṃ anāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.14:129.1.pli: Araṇaṃ anāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:130.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbo.)

patthana3.14:131.1.pli: Saraṇaṃ paccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.14:132.1.pli: Araṇaṃ paccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:133.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbo.)

patthana3.14:134.1.pli: Saraṇaṃ ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.14:135.1.pli: Araṇaṃ ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.14:136.1.pli: Saraṇaṃ ajjhattañca araṇaṃ ajjhattañca dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:137.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbo.)

patthana3.14:138.1.pli: Saraṇaṃ bahiddhā dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.14:139.1.pli: Araṇaṃ bahiddhā dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.14:140.1.pli: Saraṇaṃ bahiddhā ca araṇaṃ bahiddhā ca dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:141.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:143.1.pli: Saraṇaṃ ajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.14:144.1.pli: Araṇaṃ ajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:145.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbo.)

patthana3.14:146.1.pli: Saraṇaṃ bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.14:147.1.pli: Araṇaṃ bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:148.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbo.)

patthana3.14:149.1.pli: Araṇaṃ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:150.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana3.14:151.1.pli: Saraṇaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.14:152.1.pli: Araṇaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.14:153.1.pli: Saraṇaṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca araṇaṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:154.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavāropi …pe… sampayuttavāropi vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.14:155.1.pli: Araṇo anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo araṇassa anidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ. (Aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye ekaṃ, atthiyā ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ. Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:156.1.pli: Saraṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo saraṇassa anidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. Araṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo araṇassa anidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:157.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre indriye jhāne magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.14:161.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
